attributes.action: Revoke the right to remain in the U.K. of any assialum seeker or immigrant who speaks out inciting racial or religous hatred or acts against the interests of the British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any assialum seeker or immigrant who obviously hates us so much has to have the privalage of being allowed to remain in the U.K. revoked. It is time that the human rights of the majority was considered before that of these people, and they have to be deported no matter what threats they CLAIM to be under. The british public has been very patient but that is now wearing very thin. We now read that 90% of immigrants refused permission are allowed to stay, while many are no doubt good people we are FULL. G.Reid
